flawed_nl_solution:
Liza got 60 x 90/100 = <<60*90/100=600/9>>600/9 of the items correctly.
So, Rose got 600/9 + 2 = <<600/9+2=206/3>>206/3 of the items correctly.
Thus, Rose had 60 - 206/3 = <<60-206/3=-26/3>>-26/3 incorrect answers.
#### -26/3

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 54, not 600/9. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
